document.full_text: mark kerrigan, olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan's brother, was sentenced to two-and-a-half years in prison on thursday for assault and battery of his elderly father who died during their physical struggle.
document.title: brother of olympic skater kerrigan sentenced to prison
lines_and_colors: mark kerrigan, olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan's brother, was sentenced to two-and-a-half years in prison on thursday for assault and battery of his elderly father who died during their physical struggle.
